profileAlternative.name: Savvy Gupta
profileAlternative.headline: Project Management Intern at Empowerly
profileAlternative.summary: Passionate Computer Science major eager to create technology to address large-scale problems. Teacher. Skilled in web dev, Java, Python and excited to learn more programming languages. Currently attending the University of Washington, Class of 2022.

aboutAlternative.text: Passionate Computer Science major eager to create technology to address large-scale problems. Teacher. Skilled in web dev, Java, Python and excited to learn more programming languages. Currently attending the University of Washington, Class of 2022.

positions.title: Product Management Intern
positions.description: Work to improve the Empowerly student experience by researching and analyzing student needs and feedback. Aid in strategy, prioritization, design, and testing of new portal features. Additionally work alongside software engineers to learn and utilize React.

positions.title: Web Development Director
positions.description: Built and maintain the non-profitâ€™s website. Collaborated with organizations nationwide to consolidate the non-profitâ€™s work on one platform. Experimented with various designs and CSS libraries to find a format that best fit our message.

positions.title: Teaching Assistant (2018)
positions.description: (Summer 2018, Summer 2019) I teach high school students how to code and navigate technology, more specifically through platforms and languages like Scratch, Python, HTML/CSS/JavaScript etc. We also cover topics like robotics and data science, while highlighting accomplished women in technology as potential role models.

positions.title: Project Leader, Teacher
positions.description: I teach 1st-6th grade girls programming (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python) and the importance of technology in present day lives, along with exposing them to female role models in STEM.

positions.title: Bay Area Branch Vice President
positions.description: I help manage the Bay Areaâ€™s Miss CEO chapter, providing resources for girls to pursue leadership positions and various avenues of career exploration, along with building social confidence.

positions.title: Co-Founder, Web Technician, Vice President (High School Branch)
positions.description: I organize meal-packaging events for students, hold presentations on poverty at elementary schools, manage opportunities for soup-kitchen volunteering. As a club, weâ€™ve packaged over 50,000 meals and counting!

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
positions.description: I worked on Applause, a technology allowing real-time customer feedback created by Meimodo Inc., with programs like Postman and Load Testing to conduct server testing and collect + map the resulting data. I also wrote scripts in JavaScript to that automated the process of simulating clients, networks, and devices and determined weaknesses in the server.
